title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 7 - TEMPORARY RESIDENCES, MASS GATHERINGS AND CHILDREN'S CAMPS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 7 - TEMPORARY RESIDENCES, MASS GATHERINGS AND CHILDREN'S CAMPS
State Regulations

Subpart 7-1 - Temporary Residences (hotels, Motels And Cabin Colonies)

Subpart 7-2 - CHILDREN'S CAMPS (§ 7-2.1 to 7-2.25)

Subpart 7-3 - Campgrounds (§ 7-3.1 to 7-3.19)

Subpart 7-4 - Mass Gatherings (§ 7-4.1 to 7-4.10)

Subpart 7-5 - Agricultural Fairgrounds (§ 7-5.1 to 7-5.15)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 7

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 206[1][a], 225

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
